command.command: root\cimv2::select PercentProcessorTime from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like '%java%'
root\cimv2::select WorkingSet from Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process where Name like '%java%'

kpipolicy.alertdesc3: 内存利用率超过${trigervalue1}%,当前值为${value}%
kpipolicy.alertdesc4: 内存利用率超过${trigervalue1}%,当前值为${value}%
